code.content:
import requests

def summarize_text(text, api_key):
    """Simple text summarization using an API"""
    url = "https://api.example.com/summarize"
    payload = {'text': text, 'key': api_key}
    response = requests.post(url, json=payload)
    if response.status_code == 200:
        return response.json()['summary']
    else:
        return "Error summarizing text"

# Example usage
api_key = 'your-api-key'
text = "Long text to summarize..."
print(summarize_text(text, api_key))

from flask import Flask, render_template_string, request app = Flask(__name__) # Simple HTML template embedded inside Python HTML_TEMPLATE = """ Text Summarization App

AI Text Summarizer



{% if summary %}

Summary:

{{ summary }}

{% endif %}
""" # Dummy summarization logic def simple_summarizer(text): sentences = text.split('.') if len(sentences) > 2: return sentences[0] + '.' + sentences[-2] + '.' return text @app.route('/', methods=['GET', 'POST']) def index(): summary = None if request.method == 'POST': text = request.form.get('inputText') summary = simple_summarizer(text) return render_template_string(HTML_TEMPLATE, summary=summary) if __name__ == '__main__': app.run(debug=True)

quiz.title: Knowledge Check
quiz.description: Test your understanding with these comprehensive questions

questions.question: Which of the following are important considerations when implementing AI text summarization in a web application? (Select all that apply)
options: API rate limiting and cost management
questions.explanation: All of these are crucial considerations for production AI applications. Rate limiting prevents cost overruns, error handling ensures reliability, input validation prevents security issues, caching improves performance, and API key security is essential for protecting your application.

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of using Google's Gemini API for text summarization compared to traditional rule-based approaches?
options: It's completely free with unlimited usage
It can understand context and meaning for more accurate summaries
It works only with English text
It requires no API key setup
questions.explanation: AI-based APIs like Gemini can understand context, sentiment, and meaning in text, providing more accurate and nuanced summaries compared to simple rule-based approaches.

explanation_image.alt: Comparison of AI vs traditional text processing

questions.question: Which of the following is the most important consideration when integrating an AI API into a web application?
options: Proper error handling and fallback mechanisms
The number of API calls per minute
questions.explanation: Robust error handling and fallback mechanisms are crucial for production applications to ensure reliability and user experience when API calls fail.
